b.span: PARTICULARS TO APPEAR ON THE OUTER PACKAGING

title.value: PARTICULARS TO APPEAR ON THE OUTER PACKAGING

p.span: Abilify Maintena 300 mg powder and solvent for prolonged-release suspension for injection
Each vial contains 300 mg aripiprazole. After reconstitution each ml of suspension contains 200 mg aripiprazole.
Carmellose sodium, mannitol, sodium dihydrogen phosphate monohydrate, sodium hydroxide
Powder and solvent for prolonged-release suspension for injection
Two sterile syringes, one with needle for reconstitution
Read the package leaflet before use.
Shake the vial vigorously for at least 30 seconds until the suspension appears uniform.
If the injection is not performed immediately after reconstitution shake it vigorously for at least 60 seconds to re‑suspend prior to injection.

b.span: 6. SPECIAL WARNING THAT THE MEDICINAL PRODUCT MUST BE STORED OUT OF THE SIGHT AND REACH OF CHILDREN

title.value: 6. SPECIAL WARNING THAT THE MEDICINAL PRODUCT MUST BE STORED OUT OF THE SIGHT AND REACH OF CHILDREN

p.span: Keep out of the sight and reach of children.
Do not store the reconstituted suspension in the syringe.

b.span: 10. SPECIAL PRECAUTIONS FOR DISPOSAL OF UNUSED MEDICINAL PRODUCTS OR WASTE MATERIALS DERIVED FROM SUCH MEDICINAL PRODUCTS, IF APPROPRIATE

title.value: 10. SPECIAL PRECAUTIONS FOR DISPOSAL OF UNUSED MEDICINAL PRODUCTS OR WASTE MATERIALS DERIVED FROM SUCH MEDICINAL PRODUCTS, IF APPROPRIATE

p.span: Discard vial, adapter, syringe, needles, unused suspension and water for injections appropriately.

b.span: 11. NAME AND ADDRESS OF THE MARKETING AUTHORISATION HOLDER

title.value: 11. NAME AND ADDRESS OF THE MARKETING AUTHORISATION HOLDER

p.span: Justification for not including Braille accepted.
2D barcode carrying the unique identifier included.

b.span: MINIMUM PARTICULARS TO APPEAR ON SMALL IMMEDIATE PACKAGING UNITS

title.value: PARTICULARS TO APPEAR ON THE OUTER PACKAGING

p.span: Abilify Maintena 300 mg powder and solvent for prolonged-release suspension for injection in pre‑filled syringe
Each pre‑filled syringe contains 300 mg aripiprazole.
After reconstitution each ml of suspension contains 200 mg aripiprazole.
Carmellose sodium, mannitol, sodium dihydrogen phosphate monohydrate, sodium hydroxide
Powder and solvent for prolonged-release suspension for injection
pre‑filled syringe containing powder in the front chamber and solvent in the rear chamber.
Read the package leaflet before use.
Vertically shake the syringe vigorously for 20 seconds until medicine is uniformly milky-white and use immediately.

b.span: 6. SPECIAL WARNING THAT THE MEDICINAL PRODUCT MUST BE STORED OUT OF THE SIGHT AND REACH OF CHILDREN

title.value: 6. SPECIAL WARNING THAT THE MEDICINAL PRODUCT MUST BE STORED OUT OF THE SIGHT AND REACH OF CHILDREN

p.span: Keep out of the sight and reach of children.

If the injection is not performed immediately after reconstitution, the syringe can be kept below 25 °C for up to 2 hours. Shake the syringe vigorously for at least 20 seconds to re‑suspend prior to injection if the syringe has been left for more than 15 minutes.
Keep the pre‑filled syringe in the outer carton in order to protect from light.

b.span: 10. SPECIAL PRECAUTIONS FOR DISPOSAL OF UNUSED MEDICINAL PRODUCTS OR WASTE MATERIALS DERIVED FROM SUCH MEDICINAL PRODUCTS, IF APPROPRIATE

title.value: 10. SPECIAL PRECAUTIONS FOR DISPOSAL OF UNUSED MEDICINAL PRODUCTS OR WASTE MATERIALS DERIVED FROM SUCH MEDICINAL PRODUCTS, IF APPROPRIATE

p.span: Discard pre‑filled syringe and needles appropriately.

b.span: 11. NAME AND ADDRESS OF THE MARKETING AUTHORISATION HOLDER

title.value: 11. NAME AND ADDRESS OF THE MARKETING AUTHORISATION HOLDER

p.span: Justification for not including Braille accepted.
2D barcode carrying the unique identifier included.
